[host_machine]
system = 'darwin'
cpu_family = 'x86_64'
cpu = 'x86_64'
endian = 'little'

[binaries]
c = 'clang'
objc = 'clang'
cpp = 'clang++'
ar = 'ar'
ld = 'ld'
strip = 'strip'
lipo = 'lipo'
ranlib = 'ranlib'

[built-in options]
prefix = '/usr/local'
c_args = ['-arch', 'x86_64', '-mmacosx-version-min=10.13']
c_link_args = ['-arch', 'x86_64', '-mmacosx-version-min=10.13']
default_library = 'static'
buildtype = 'release'
